notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected areas of destruction in the town of Malakal as seen by the WorldView-2 satellite on 18 January 2014. UNOSAT identified a total of 515 destroyed residential and related structures and a total of 58 warehouse or commercial structures were identified throughout the area analyzed, with the heaviest damage in the downtown area and along primary roads bordering the town. In addition, multiple indications of looting are evident in the warehouse area and in residential areas along the southeast edge of town. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
